title: Bug 10593: Jar export should add ".jar" suffix if not specified
description: When using Build 20020228, if some files are selected for export using the jar export feature and the user enters "test" as the jar name, the created jar file is named "test" instead of "test.jar". The correct behavior should be to automatically append the ".jar" suffix to the specified name.
OB: Build 20020228, select some files, export them using the jar export feature, enter "test" as the jar name
EB: The resulting jar file is named "test" instead of "test.jar"
SR: The jar export should automatically append the ".jar" suffix to the specified name if not already specified.
